The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 16 July is 50,318 (5,824 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 July, there were 2,533 new confirmed cases (293.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 July, there were 1,718 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 47% (815 extra cases).
